short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay Connected to What Drives Your Business with the Super Dispatch Connection Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Dispatch offers an all-in-one auto transport platform for shippers, carriers, and brokers, making it easier, smarter, and faster to move cars. Enhance your workflow and boost efficiency with our powerful Chrome extension.

For Shippers & Brokers:

Seamless CRM Integration: Post new orders and monitor load status directly within your CRM. Stay updated on every stage of the transport process without switching platforms.

Supported CRMs: ProABD, BATS & Message.Plane

Key Benefits:
- Gain real-time visibility into load status and driver locations.
- Improve customer service with timely and accurate updates.
- Simplify order management and enhance communication with carriers.
- Load Status Updates Include: Pick-up date and time, Delivery date, time, and ETA, Carrier - name and contact information, & Up-to-date driver location

For Carriers:

Connect All Your Loads: Instantly import dispatch sheets with a single click from various load boards, keeping all your loads organized in one place. Save time and reduce errors by managing everything centrally.

Supported Load Boards: ACV Transportation, CarMax, CarsArrive, Central Dispatch, DriveTime, & Ship.Cars Market

Key Benefits:
- Streamline operations with a unified view of all loads.
- Minimize manual data entry and improve accuracy.
- Enhance productivity with easy access to load details.

By using this extension, you agree to Super Dispatch’s Terms and Conditions (https://superdispatch.com/terms-of-service/) and Privacy Policy (https://superdispatch.com/privacy-policy/).

Start transforming your auto transport operations today with Super Dispatch’s Chrome extension, and experience the benefits of a more connected, efficient, and productive workflow.

Don’t have a Super Dispatch account? Click here (https://signup.superdispatch.com/) to get started today!
